snippet: You can never be assured that your passage to eternal bliss will get the attention it deserves.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Thomas Vinciguerra notes how some obituaries of noteworthy people are overshadowed by either other events or the passing of those more famous; points out death of 1960s actress Arlene Martel was hardly acknowledged by most publications because it occurred amid deaths of Robin Williams and Lauren Bacall.
lead_paragraph: You can never be assured that your passage to eternal bliss will get the attention it deserves.
